name: predss
params: class c0, class c1, class c2

stmt.origin: eqsstri(cpred(c0, c1, c2), c1, cin(c1, cima(ccnv(c0), csn(c2))))
stmt.pretty: eqsstri(Pred(c0, c1, c2), c1, (c1 ⋂(`' c0 " { c2 })))

body.origin:
|- wss(cpred(c0, c1, c2), c1)
-| wceq(cpred(c0, c1, c2), cin(c1, cima(ccnv(c0), csn(c2))))
-| wss(cin(c1, cima(ccnv(c0), csn(c2))), c1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wss(cpred(c0, c1, c2), c1)
-| wceq(cpred(c0, c1, c2), cin(c1, cima(ccnv(c0), csn(c2))))
-| wss(cin(c1, cima(ccnv(c0), csn(c2))), c1)

body.origin: |- wceq(cpred(c0, c1, c2), cin(c1, cima(ccnv(c0), csn(c2))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wss(cpred(c0, c1, c2), c1)
-| wss(cin(c1, cima(ccnv(c0), csn(c2))), c1)

comment: The predecessor class of ` A ` is a subset of ` A ` . (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 2-Feb-2011.)
